>>Weather Borna

The climate here is considered warm and temperate. There is significant rainfall throughout the year in Borna. Even the driest month still has a lot of rainfall. This location is classified as Cfb by Köppen and Geiger. The temperature in this location is approximately 10.0 °C | 50.0 °F, as determined by statistical analysis. The precipitation level on a yearly basis amounts to 726 mm | 28.6 inch as per the meteorological records.

Borna are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Borna

In February, the precipitation level plummets to a mere 47 mm | 1.9 inch. This month holds the title for being exceptionally arid. Most precipitation falls in July, with an average of 78 mm | 3.1 inch.

average temperature by month Borna

The month of highest temperature is July during which the average temperature reaches up to 19.5 °C | 67.0 °F. In January, the average temperature is 0.8 °C | 33.4 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

The precipitation variance between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 31 mm | 1 inch. The average temperatures vary during the year by 18.7 °C | 33.6 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (83.59 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is August (66.52 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is December (13.53 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is April (10.13 days).

Hours of sunshine in Borna

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Borna, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 10.96 hours of sunshine. In total there are 339.74 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month with the fewest daily hours of sunshine in Borna is January with an average of 3.19 hours of sunshine a day. In total there are 98.83 hours of sunshine in January.

Around 2513.81 hours of sunshine are counted in Borna throughout the year. On average there are 82.47 hours of sunshine per month.
